case.name: Back to black
case.description: Caulifla ain't feeling herself anymore. She's dropped out of her Super Saiyan form.

case.name: Taking flight
case.description: She starts to fly when she takes her boots off.

case.name: About to transform
case.description: Caulifla appears to take a medatative stance. Though it is unclear why.

case.name: A transforming Saiyan
case.description: Caulifla disappears in a blinding flash of light.

case.name: SSJ transformation
case.description: Caulifla has transformed into a Super Saiyan! And lost her pants as a result.

case.name: SSJ second wind
case.description: She involuntariily transforms when she orgasms. Must have felt pretty good.
